{\ottdruleLXXLlimpEName}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdefnatl}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A} $}{\ottcom{Attack Tree Logic (ATL)}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXnode{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXCtx{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXparaI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXchoiceI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXseqI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXparaE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXchoiceE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXseqE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXlimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXRlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXRlimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXLlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLXXLlimpE{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn att
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ATT\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{T} }{%
{\ottdruleATTXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXnodeName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ATT\_node}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXnode}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \cdot   \vdash   \mathsf{n}   :  \ottmv{N} }{%
{\ottdruleATTXXnodeName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXparaIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ATT\_paraI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXparaI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleATTXXparaIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXchoiceIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ATT\_choiceI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXchoiceI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
  \Gamma \,.\, \Delta   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleATTXXchoiceIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXseqIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ATT\_seqI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleATTXXseqI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleATTXXseqIName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnatt}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{T} $}{\ottcom{Valid Attack Tree Type Theory (ATTT)}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleATTXXvar{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleATTXXseqI{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn atv
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXnodeName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_node}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXnode}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \cdot   \vdash   \mathsf{n}   :  \ottmv{N} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXnodeName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXexOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_ex1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXexOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
  \Gamma ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXexOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXexTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_ex2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXexTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma (  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \,.\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
  \Gamma (  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \,.\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXexTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXdistOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_dist1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXdistOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \ottsym{(}   \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} \,.\, \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{)} )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  D   \quad   \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \not\in \mathsf{FV}( \ottnt{t} )  }%
}{
  \Gamma (  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)} \,.\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)}  )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  D }{%
{\ottdruleTXXdistOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXdistTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_dist2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXdistTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{     \Gamma (  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{11}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)} \,.\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{12}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)}  )   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  D   \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \neq   \cdot     \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \neq   \cdot  }%
}{
  \Gamma ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \ottsym{(}   \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} \,.\, \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{)} )   \vdash   \mathsf{dist}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{11}}}} , \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{12}}}} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   :  D }{%
{\ottdruleTXXdistTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXparaIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_paraI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXparaI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \odot  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXparaIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoiceIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_choiceI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoiceI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
  \Gamma \,.\, \Delta   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \sqcup  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXchoiceIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseqIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_seqI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseqI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rhd  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXseqIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXparaEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_paraE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXparaE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \odot  \ottnt{B}   \quad    \Delta ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} )   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}  }%
}{
  \Delta ( \Gamma )   \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXparaEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoiceEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_choiceE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoiceE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \sqcup  \ottnt{B}   \quad    \Delta (  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \,.\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  )   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}  }%
}{
  \Delta ( \Gamma )   \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXchoiceEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseqEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_seqE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseqE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rhd  \ottnt{B}   \quad    \Delta ( \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} )   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}  }%
}{
  \Delta ( \Gamma )   \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXseqEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_limpI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_limpE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXRlimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_RlimpI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXRlimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  .   \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXRlimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXRlimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_RlimpE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXRlimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXRlimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLlimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_LlimpI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLlimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  .   \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXLlimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLlimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_LlimpE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLlimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXLlimpEName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnatv}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{\ottcom{Attack Tree Type Theory (ATTT)}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXnode{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXexOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXexTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXdistOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXdistTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXparaI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXchoiceI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXseqI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXparaE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXchoiceE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXseqE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXlimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXRlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXRlimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXLlimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXLlimpE{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn red
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaBetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_paraBeta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaBeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXparaBetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXchoiceBetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_choiceBeta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXchoiceBeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXchoiceBetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXseqBetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_seqBeta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXseqBeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXseqBetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbetarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_betar}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbetar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottsym{(}   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  .   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXbetarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbetalName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_betal}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXbetal}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottsym{(}   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  .   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleRXXbetalName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaCCName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_paraCC}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaCC}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleRXXparaCCName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaCCCName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_paraCCC}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaCCC}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleRXXparaCCCName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaSCCName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_paraSCC}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXparaSCC}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleRXXparaSCCName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXchoiceCCName}[0]{\ottdrulename{R\_choiceCC}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRXXchoiceCC}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
